sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import Moment from 'react-moment' function ResultOrders({ orders }) { return <>
{orders && orders.map(order =>{ const {state, date, owner, items, id} = order let totalPrice = 0 return
  • STATE: {state}
  • DATE: {date}
  • COMPANY: {owner.company}
  • COUNTRY: {owner.country}
  • EMAIL: {owner.email}
  • TOTAL PRICE: {totalPrice}
  • ARTICLES
      • {items.map(item =>{ const totalItem = item.article.price * item.quantity totalPrice += totalItem return
      • Article:
      • Ref: {item.article.ref}
      • Tite: {item.article.title}
      • Quantity: {item.quantity}
      • Price: {item.article.price} E
      • TOTAL: {totalItem} E
      })}
})}
} export default withRouter(ResultOrders)
